About 14 Concord Unit 712

Perched up high, looking towards the entrance into Harvard Square sits this enviable one bedroom unit. It’s unquestionably sun-drenched and boasts hardwood floors, a modern kitchen, beautiful bathroom, plenty of closets and a large private balcony. With over 8 million annual visitors Harvard Square remains one of the most beloved villages in the entire country. Packed with wonderful architecture, Harvard University, a myriad of tasty eateries, coffee cafes, and shopping opportunities it leaves you smiling and fulfilled. It’s both beautiful and buzzing with intellectual vigor.This is an estate sale. Property to be delivered in as-is condition. Can also be bought with unit 724 MLS #73199836 a side-by-side two bedroom unit.
